20 #ifndef __G_MAPPED_FILE_H__
21 #define __G_MAPPED_FILE_H__
22 
23 #if !defined (__GLIB_H_INSIDE__) && !defined (GLIB_COMPILATION)
24 #error "Only <glib.h> can be included directly."
25 #endif
26 
27 #include <glib/gbytes.h>
28 #include <glib/gerror.h>
29 
30 G_BEGIN_DECLS
31 
32 typedef struct _GMappedFile GMappedFile;
33 
34 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
35 GMappedFile *g_mapped_file_new          (const gchar  *filename,
36                          gboolean      writable,
37                          GError      **error);
38 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
39 GMappedFile *g_mapped_file_new_from_fd  (gint          fd,
40                      gboolean      writable,
41                      GError      **error);
42 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
43 gsize        g_mapped_file_get_length   (GMappedFile  *file);
44 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
45 gchar       *g_mapped_file_get_contents (GMappedFile  *file);
46 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_2_34
47 GBytes *     g_mapped_file_get_bytes    (GMappedFile  *file);
48 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
49 GMappedFile *g_mapped_file_ref          (GMappedFile  *file);
50 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
51 void         g_mapped_file_unref        (GMappedFile  *file);
52 
53 GLIB_DEPRECATED_FOR(g_mapped_file_unref)
54 void         g_mapped_file_free         (GMappedFile  *file);
55 
56 G_END_DECLS
57 
58 #endif /* __G_MAPPED_FILE_H__ */
--- EOF ---
